name: Stellar Blast! Lite
description:
Remember the days of playing Space Invaders and Galaga at the arcade? Well now you can enjoy the same style game right in the palm of your hand! STELLAR BLAST!™ LITE is reminiscent of the old style space games with a more modern look and many new features! STELLAR BLAST LITE is brought to you by Skyworks®, creators of the best quality and most fun games on the iPhone/iPod touch!

To move your ship, tap the screen where you want to go. To shoot, you have to move your finger across the screen. You will have to destroy enemy ships, evade space mines, blow up a mother ship.

UPGRADE TO THE FULL VERSION TO GET THESE GREAT FEATURES:

- CLASSIC MODE – Fly through infinite, progressively harder levels shooting enemy ships and destroying the mother ship!

-SPECIAL PICKUPS – Ammo, Health, and Extra Life pickups for prolonged play-time.

- GLOBAL HIGH SCORE BOARDS – Compete against star fighters around the world!

So if you like Space Invader style games then you will love STELLAR BLAST! LITE After you buy STELLAR BLAST! LITE, try WORLD CUP TABLE TENNIS™, 3 POINT HOOPS® and other hit titles from Skyworks®, including ARCADE BOWLING™, ARCADE HOOPS BASKETBALL™. Just search for “Skyworks” in the App Store search bar, find your favorite games, and have fun!!!

Skyworks – Find Your Game! Look for more new games from Skyworks COMING SOON!

www.Skyworks.com
